sentences.en: All else is only a bondage.
All people, she said, lived their lives in bondage to hunger, pain and lust.
sentences.cn: 她说，所有人的生活都受缚于饥饿、苦痛和欲望。

sentences.en: He had eradicated abnormal instincts and thus delivered not a few from a hateful bondage.
sentences.cn: 他根除了反常的禀性,帮不少人卸下了可怕的负担.

sentences.en: He is in bondage to his ambition.
If your god is almighty, why does he leave you in bondage?
sentences.cn: 如果是全能的神袖为何让你们活在枷锁中?

sentences.en: It did not shrink from such words as fatality, bondage and the like.
sentences.cn: 它并不在乎诸如宿命 、 束缚之类的词语.

sentences.en: Let him not lie in the bondage of night.
sentences.cn: 让他不再呆在黑暗的束缚里.

sentences.en: Mother, it is no gain, thy bondage of finery.
sentences.cn: 母亲, 这是毫无好处的, 如你的华美的约束.

sentences.en: Paul says: " I buffet my body and bring it into bondage. "
sentences.cn: 保罗说: “ 我攻克己身,叫身服我. ”

sentences.en: Possibly she would come out of bondage into freedom -- who knows?
sentences.cn: 她可能从束缚中解放出来而获得自由 ― 谁知道 呢 ?

sentences.en: She had been long enough in bondage to other people's pleasure.
sentences.cn: 她充当别人寻欢作乐的工具已多年了.
刚刚做母亲时所受的束缚

sentences.en: They aim to deliver the people who are in bondage to superstitious belief.
sentences.cn: 他们的目的在于解脱那些受迷信束缚的人.

sentences.en: We should break the bondage of ossified thinking.
sentences.cn: 我们要冲破保守僵化思想的束缚.

sentences.en: women's liberation from the bondage of domestic life
sentences.cn: 女性从家庭生活束缚中的解脱

trans.tran_en: the state of having your freedom limited, or being prevented from doing what you want
